metadata.title: CVE-2020-14154 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Mutt before 1.14.3 proceeds with a connection even if, in response to aGnuTLS certificate prompt, the user rejects an expired intermediatecertificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14154` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.9.4-3ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mutt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.4-3ubuntu0.2').
